cards.title: Soulbinder
setup: At the start of the game, put the character card for {SoulbinderMortalFormCharacter} and one of the character cards for {SoulshardOfLightningCharacter}, {SoulshardOfMercuryCharacter}, and {SoulshardOfIronCharacter} into play, active side up. Put the rest of the character cards into play, incapacitated side up.
Shuffle the hero deck and draw 4 cards.
gameplay: When {SoulshardOfLightningCharacter}, {SoulshardOfMercuryCharacter}, or {SoulshardOfIronCharacter} would be incapacitated, first flip another of your Incapacitated Heroes and restore it to 9 HP. Then, remove the incapacitated Hero from the game.
If you have no active heroes in play, flip this card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This place's aura is unique. I won't have you disturbing it.
